description: Creates Categories for the Amazon Q Business application environment instance. Web experience users use Categories to tag and filter library items. For more information, see Custom labels for Amazon Q Apps.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: The list of category objects to be created (dict) --- The category object to be created. id (string) --- The unique identifier to be associated with a category. If you don't include a value, the category is automatically assigned a unique identifier. The name of the category. color (string) --- The color to be associated with a category. The color must be a hexadecimal value of either 3 or 6 digits.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The unique identifier to be associated with a category. If you don't include a value, the category is automatically assigned a unique identifier.

nested_params.name: color
nested_params.description: The color to be associated with a category. The color must be a hexadecimal value of either 3 or 6 digits.
